object.name: News Item
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="autor" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>Secretaria Executiva de Comunicação</default> <description/> <title>Autor</title> <values> <element>Secretaria Executiva de Comunicação</element> </values> </field> <field name="text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Text</title> </field> <fieldset name="capas" label="Capas"> <field name="slider_home" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Título para destaque principal</title> </field> <field name="descricao_slider_home" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Linha fina para destaque principal</title> </field> <field name="listagem_noticias" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Título para listagem de notícias</title> </field> <field name="descricao_listagem_noticia" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Linha fina para listagem de notícias</title> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
